meanings.definition: The area or region near a bay.
meanings.sent1: We took a walk along the bayside to enjoy the view of the water.
meanings.sent2: Living on the bayside means you can see the ocean every day.
meanings.sent3: The seagulls love to gather by the bayside and watch the boats go by.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt as calm and expansive as the bayside on a peaceful morning.
meanings.sent5: The bayside at sunset painted the sky with hues of orange and pink.

meanings.definition: Facing or situated near a bay.
meanings.sent1: The cozy bayside cottages offered a perfect retreat for the weekend.
meanings.sent2: The bayside restaurant had a stunning view of the bay from every table.
meanings.sent3: The sleepy town had a bayside charm that drew visitors from far and wide.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as refreshing as a cool breeze on a hot bayside afternoon.
meanings.sent5: The bayside breeze carried the scent of saltwater and adventure.
